alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:27PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL WEBSTER...SOUTHERN CLAIBORNE...NORTHEASTERN BIENVILLE... EAST CENTRAL BOSSIER AND WESTERN LINCOLN PARISHES... At 226 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Dixie Inn, or 8 miles northwest of Minden, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Minden, Homer, Arcadia, Sibley, Cotton Valley, Gibsland, Doyline, Dubberly, Dixie Inn, Eastwood, Simsboro, Evergreen, Athens, Lisbon, Bryceland, Mount Lebanon, Fillmore, Gilark, Lake Clairborne and Corinth. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
